name: The Fortune Teller
description:
You find yourself in a forest. How did you get here?

It occurs to you that you've had a lot on your mind lately. Perhaps as your mind wandered, your feet did as well.

Now, what's that up ahead? Who lives in these woods?

It seems you have a lot of questions.

Would you like to have some answered?

Created for the Arcade Arcanum Tarot Jam. Play the desktop build for super fancy fog effects!
